footer.aboutMeText1: I am a Full Stack Developer and IT Solution Architect with over 10 years of experience in Java backend development and microservice architectures. My focus: scalable cloud solutions, clean code, and sustainable engineering. With my architectural experience and communicative strengths, I efficiently pinpoint complex requirements – from conception to implementation.
footer.responseTime: Emails are answered within 1-2 business days.
footer.contactPhone: For telephone contact, please arrange in advance via email.
